abstract: Bart M Schwartz, former chief of criminal division in United States attorney’s office in Manhattan, is appointed federal monitor for General Motors as part of ignition switch settlement.
lead_paragraph: Bart M. Schwartz, once chief of the criminal division of the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan, will review practices at the automaker.

headline.main: Ex-Federal Prosecutor Is Named to Monitor G.M.
headline.print_headline: Ex-Federal Prosecutor Is Named to Monitor G.M.

snippet: Bart M. Schwartz, once chief of the criminal division of the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan, will review practices at the automaker.
